title: Dynamic stereo displays
proctitle: CHI '95: Proceedings of the SIGCHI Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems

authors.name: Colin Ware
authors.institution: Faculty of Computer Science, University of New Brunswick, P.O. Box 4400, Fredericton, New Brunswick, Canada E3B 5A3

Patterson, Robert (1992) Human Stereopsis. Human Factors, 34(2) 669-692.
